definitions.definition: Under anesthesia, especially general anesthesia; sedated.
definitions.example: Ensure the patient is sufficiently under.

definitions.definition: In a way lower or less than.

definitions.example: It took the hypnotist several minutes to make his subject go under.

definitions.definition: In or at a lower level than.
As a subject of; subordinate to.
definitions.example: He served in World War II under General Omar Bradley.

definitions.definition: In the face of; in response to (some attacking force).
definitions.example: to collapse under stress; to give in under interrogation
he writes books under the name John Smith
